title: Is a naturopathic doctor a real doctor? What alternative methods does a naturopathic practitioner suggest?
description: Answer (1 of 8): Responding to A2A. Naturopaths do have a doctorate in naturopathic medicine. They do also take many courses similar to what MDs take: https://aanmc.org/comparing-nd-md-curricula/ Orientation, however, is significantly different. There are NO naturopathic surgeons, for example. N...
